description: Boston Sand & Gravel Co. provides ready mixed concrete and aggregate products to the construction and landscaping industries in southeastern New England. The company offers ready mix concrete that include specialty mixes for winter concrete, slurry walls, and drilled shafts, as well as sand and aggregate, concrete blocks, and green products. Its products are used in projects ranging from small residential pours to mass pours for commercial and infrastructure projects; and construction projects, including central artery/tunnel project, waste water treatment plants, nuclear power plants, high rise-buildings, and slurry wall construction projects. The company serves customers through sales representatives. Boston Sand & Gravel Co. was founded in 1914 and is based in Boston, Massachusetts.
